screens.passage:
A veces me pregunto c√≥mo ser√≠a mi vida si hubiera tomado decisiones diferentes. Si hubiera estudiado medicina, ahora ser√≠a m√©dico. Si me hubiera quedado en mi pa√≠s, tendr√≠a una vida m√°s tranquila.

screens.translation:
Sometimes I wonder what my life would be like if I had made different decisions. If I had studied medicine, I would now be a doctor. If I had stayed in my country, I would have a calmer life.

But I don't regret it. If I could go back, I would probably do the same. Each decision has brought me to where I am today.

As the saying goes: 'If my grandmother had wheels, she would be a bicycle.' It doesn't make sense to live thinking about 'ifs'.
